channel.title: Tag: motivation - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Pondering the cobwebs
item.description: <html><head></head><body>It's plain to see that I've not been a blogger for a long time. This place is a long-neglected ghost town that sees a begrudged entry every few months, when I happen to remember it still exists and I feel guilty for not feeding it with content. What I've yet to figure out is if the cause is a matter of motivation, publishing tools, audience, or writing topics. Behold as I ramble on for many tens of words pondering the cobwebs here at 0xDECAFBAD.</body></html>
